meanings.sent1: I will disclose the surprise party to my friend.
meanings.sent2: She decided to disclose her true feelings to her family.
meanings.sent3: The magician will disclose the hidden card with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise will slowly disclose the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The detective will disclose the identity of the culprit at the end of the movie.

meanings.sent1: Please disclose the hidden treasure map for us to find.
meanings.sent2: The clouds will disclose the full moon tonight.
meanings.sent3: The curtain will disclose the surprise guest on stage.
meanings.sent4: The mist will slowly disclose the majestic mountain peak.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight will disclose the mysterious shadows in the dark cave.

meanings.sent1: The witness will disclose the crucial information during the trial.
meanings.sent2: The ancient scroll will disclose the lost language of the civilization.
meanings.sent3: The fortune cookie will disclose a surprising prediction for your future.
meanings.sent4: The mirror will disclose the hidden message written in invisible ink.
meanings.sent5: The telescope will disclose the distant planets in the night sky.
